text:
Rihanna took a playful jab at Helena Bonham Carter's wacky sense of style when the cast of Ocean's 8 appeared on Friday's episode of The Graham Norton Show. The actresses were discussing the Met Gala when Carter, who was wearing a penis-print dress, revealed that she'd never been to the fashion event. Rihanna responded by looking at her co-star's outfit and declaring, "That's 'cause you wear dresses like that." Carter gleefully laughed at the singer's remark.

The moment Rihanna dragged Helena Bonham Carter. -- pic.twitter.com/Mm1HZS6KGy — ---------- ---------- (@fentyvideo) June 16, 2018

Also Rihanna may be a kleptomaniac when it comes to drinks at the nightclubs when she goes out. Watch below:
title: Rihanna Shades Helena Bonham Carter's Fashion to Her Face
